description.value: Your body proves that shadow can't exist without light. Perhaps your eyes glow brighter or your veins occasionally pulse with light. You emit dim light within 5 feet of you. You can activate or suppress this ability as an action, which has the concentrate trait. Additionally, you can force fragments of your shadow to glow and cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Light] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Light] as occult innate cantrips. Cantrips are heightened to a spell rank equal to half your level rounded up.
